question: What approach are we using to define the right level of detail and coverage for this story's scenarios?
outcome: Determines whether the scenarios are granular, domain-focused, or integration-heavy
options: User-System Behavioral Flow — ensures full traceability from trigger to response
Domain Rules-Centric — validates business correctness through rule clarity
System-Centric — defines system-to-system interactions with clear request/response templates
Minimal Path Plus Alternates — covers happy path plus targeted exceptions only
Full Spec Coverage — includes all realistic variations and negative cases
Very Trustable Story — maximizes testability by scoping tight atomic flows with few steps and precise acceptance criteria
Exhaustive Behavior Split — repeats each unique behavior even when similar, discourages reuse to maximize coverage visibility
